title: OM SHIVAYA NAMAHA
review: This beautiful and ancient  Shiva temple is located at Rishikesh on the way to Laxman Jhoola. The Shiv Linga here is a huge one...A stair case is provided within the temple wherein we can climb and do Milk Abishegam by our selves... Of course you have to donate some amount to the Temple authorities against a receipt. It is informed that this Linga is made of single sculpture.

title: Lord Shiva !!
review: This temple is dedicated to the mighty Lord Shiva and is a very famous temple in Rishikesh. This is frequently thronged by visitors.

title: lord shiva temple
review: dedictaed to lord shive, this is on the road to laman jhula and the shivling here is huge. you can do abhishek here by donating some money against a receipt.

title: Worship
review: This is a place to worship Lord Shiva.  There is a big Shivling and you can do pooja for your inner peace here.  Very famous temple and a must visit spot.
